lead_paragraph: Aaron Brooks scored 30 points, Shane Battier made a tie-breaking 3-pointer with 2:11 left, and the Rockets beat the Mavericks.
snippet: Aaron Brooks scored 30 points, Shane Battier made a tie-breaking 3-pointer with 2:11 left, and the Rockets beat the Mavericks.

headline.main: Rockets Hang On to Topple the Mavericks
headline.seo: Aaron Brooks and Rockets Hold On to Topple the Mavericks
headline.print_headline: Rockets Hang On to Topple the Mavericks
